solidbase.xml.elements
Class Element

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.xml.elements.Element

public class Element
extends Object

Represents an element with child elements and attributes. Can be used to read xml data.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Field Detail

name

protected String name
The name of the element.

parent

protected Element parent
The parent of this element. Can be null for the top element.

children

protected List<Object> children
The children of this element. Will be null if there are no children.

attributes

protected Map<String,String> attributes
The attributes of this element. Will be null if there are no attributes.

Constructor Detail

Element

public Element(String name,
               Element parent)
Constructs a new element with the given name and parent.

Parameters:
name - The name of the element.
parent - The parent of the element. May be null.
Method Detail

getName

public String getName()
Returns the name of the element.

Returns:
The name of the element.

getChildren

public List<Object> getChildren()
Returns the children of the element.

Returns:
The children of the element. An empty list when there are no children.

getText

public String getText()
Returns the text contained in the element. The element must not have other child elements.

Returns:
The text contained in the element.

findElement

public Element findElement(String name)
Finds a child element with the given name. A SystemException is thrown when more than 1 element is found.

Parameters:
name - The name of the child element to find.
Returns:
The child element with the given name. Null when a child with that name does not exist.

findElements

public List<Element> findElements(String name)
Finds all the child elements with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the child elements to find.
Returns:
A list of child elements with the given name. An empty list when children with that name do not exist.

findAttribute

public String findAttribute(String name)
Find the attribute with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to find.
Returns:
The attribute with the given name. Null if the attribute does not exist.

addChild

public void addChild(Element child)
Add the given child to the element.

Parameters:
child - The child element to add.

addText

public void addText(String text)
Add a text child to the element.

Parameters:
text - The text child to add.

addAttribute

public void addAttribute(String name,
                         String value)
Add an attribute to the element.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute to add.
value - The value of the attribute to add.
